about.title: DISCOVER THE UNEXPECTED
about.description: Located in the center of Kozlu village, at the foothills of Kaz Mountains, with its high location and sea view of Lesbos Island, the upcycling-themed Bebek Resort is as small as a baby. Only 97.5 square meters! This small area is worth visiting because it will make you wonder whether you are in a neighborhood, hotel, cafe or bistro, museum or parking lot, cruise ship or caravan, or in the past or present!

sea.title: Sea Access
sea.description: Direct access to the crystal clear waters of the Aegean

caravans.title: CARAVANS
caravans.description: Experience the charm of repurposed caravans transformed into comfortable and unique accommodation areas where nostalgia meets luxury comfort in an unforgettable experience.

caravanRoom.title: CARAVAN ROOM
caravanRoom.description: Experience the charm of a caravan transformed into a comfortable and unique accommodation area that combines nostalgia with modern comfort.

historicCharm.title: HISTORIC CHARM
historicCharm.description: A stonemason built the surrounding wall using stones (Assos stone) from a ruined stone house, where ancient craftsmanship meets contemporary design.

concept.title: UPCYCLING CONCEPT
concept.subtitle: TRANSFORMING THE ORDINARY INTO EXTRAORDINARY
concept.description: At Bebek Resort, we believe that every object has a story and potential for transformation. Our upcycling philosophy goes beyond simple recycling - we breathe new life into discarded materials, creating unique and sustainable spaces that tell stories of innovation and creativity.
